description: Helper ECSchema for ECDb internal purposes.

ClassECSqlSystemProperties.description: Defines the ECSQL system properties of an ECClass in an ECSQL statement.

properties.description: Represents the Id system property in ECSQL.
properties.name: ECInstanceId

properties.description: Represents the ECClassId system property in ECSQL.
properties.name: ECClassId

NavigationECSqlSystemProperties.description: Represents the ECSQL data type of a navigation property in an ECSQL statement.

properties.description: Represents the Id system property of an NavigationProperty in ECSQL.
properties.name: Id

properties.description: Represents the Relationship ClassId system property of an NavigationProperty in ECSQL.
properties.name: RelECClassId

PointECSqlSystemProperties.description: Represents the ECSQL data type of a Point property in an ECSQL statement.

properties.description: Represents the X component of Point2d and Point3d in ECSQL
properties.name: X

properties.description: Represents the Y component of Point2d and Point3d in ECSQL
properties.name: Y

properties.description: Represents the Z component of Point3d in ECSQL
properties.name: Z

RelationshipECSqlSystemProperties.description: Defines the ECSQL system properties of an ECRelationshipClass in an ECSQL statement.

properties.description: Represents the SourceId system property of an ECRelationship in ECSQL.
properties.name: SourceECInstanceId

properties.description: Represents the SourceECClassId system property of an ECRelationship in ECSQL.
properties.name: SourceECClassId

properties.description: Represents the TargetId system property of an ECRelationship in ECSQL.
properties.name: TargetECInstanceId

properties.description: Represents the TargetECClassId system property of an ECRelationship in ECSQL.
properties.name: TargetECClassId

name: ECDbSystem
